arts.ttl: Bodo-Glimt ‘moved up a step’ after Tottenham defeat ahead of Champions League rematch
arts.sum: The Norwegian minnows say they have learned lessons from their recent defeats to Tottenham as they prepare for a rematch in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Bodo/Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur predictions: Tricky tie awaits Spurs in Norway
arts.sum: Tottenham face a tricky trip to Norway to take on Bodo/Glimt in the Champions League, but Ross Kilvngton believes that the Lilywhites can fly home with all three points in the bag.
